product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge II Long-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt - Boys'
long_description: The Columbia Silver Ridge II Long-Sleeve Tech T-shirt offers additional protection from sun exposure or cool temperatures without being heavy. Lightweight, quick-dry polyester fabric features Omni-Wick(TM) technology for improved moisture-wicking performance. Integrated Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 30 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays so his skin stays safe no matter how long his day lasts. Antimicrobial treatments helps control odors so he feels fresh even after multiple wears. Columbia Silver Ridge II Long-Sleeve Tech T-shirt features raglan style, off-the-shoulder seams to reduce irritation and chafing when wearing a pack. Long sleeves provide additional coverage for cool temperatures.
short_description: The Columbia Silver Ridge II Long-Sleeve Tech T-shirt offers additional protection from sun exposure or cool temperatures without being heavy.
